name: Timeline Miami
description:
Time Line Miami a fast paced top down shooter. where you will have to travel in time and across the multiverse to complete the level.  You keep items you when you travel through the multiverse.

 Story

Miami 2503 a Cyberpunk world you get eaten by a radioactive wormhole enhancing your implants allowing you to travel the multiverse. Now you're roped into being a hitman for The Venus Mafia and now have to murder the President of the Independent Island State of Florida to gain your freedom and avenge your android puppy.

Controls

  • Mouse to Aim 
  • WASD to move 
  • E to pick up 
  • F to throw item 
  • Left Mouse click to fire
  • Space to Open Time Travel

Credits 

Artist/ Sound Designer: Ben W ( I_Fish )

Programmers / Designers:  Liam H, Bobby
